title: Stacky
description: A Mastodon-based social media platform aiming for a less polarized and more pro-social social media experience, powered by both traditional machine learning and LLMs.

title: Anatomically Correct Life-sized Crochet Skeleton
description: A personal endeavor with a collection of friends to crochet a life-sized human skeleton, ligaments and all. The pattern comes from Luca Hodgins, and the funding from the Council for the Arts at MIT <3

title: Screening Tool for Equity Analysis of Projects (STEAP)
description: A full-stack GIS webapp improved for the US DOT to ease equitable transportation policy planning. In particular I added data analysis and report generation to the tool.

title: Self-Sufficient Cities: Deanwood, DC
description: An investigation of oral histories and city directories investigating the strength that self-sustainability and a strong sense of community gave to Deanwood DC in the early 1900s.

title: Gender Analysis Toolkit
description: A Python library developed to analyze the grammatical constructions of the books in Project Gutenberg and their connections to gender

title: Reducing Bias and Uncertainty in SS-VAE's
description: Winner of the third Lab challenge in MIT's 6.S191: Introduction to Deep Learning, I detected and reduced bias and uncertainty in a Semi-Supervised Variational Auto-Encoder with the Capsa library

title: Bikewatch
description: An interactive map of the Boston and Cambridge bike lanes, and BlueBike station traffic!
